>>===== MODE =====>>
bibliography
<<===== MODE =====<<


>>===== RESULT =====>>
<div class="csl-bib-body">
  <div class="csl-entry">Item One</div>
  <div class="csl-entry">Item Two</div>
  <div class="csl-entry">Item Six</div>
</div>
<<===== RESULT =====<<


>>===== CSL =====>>
<style 
      xmlns="http://purl.org/net/xbiblio/csl"
      class="note"
      version="1.0">
  <info>
    <id />
    <title />
    <updated>2009-08-10T04:49:00+09:00</updated>
  </info>
  <citation>
    <layout>
      <text value="Oops"/>
    </layout>
  </citation>
  <bibliography exclude-types="chapter" exclude-with-fields="jurisdiction court">
    <layout>
      <text variable="title" />
    </layout>
  </bibliography>
</style>
<<===== CSL =====<<


>>===== INPUT =====>>
[
    {
        "id": "ITEM-1", 
        "title": "Item One", 
        "type": "book"
    }, 
    {
        "id": "ITEM-2", 
        "title": "Item Two", 
        "type": "article-journal"
    }, 
    {
        "id": "ITEM-3", 
        "title": "Item Three", 
        "type": "chapter"
    }, 
    {
        "id": "ITEM-4", 
        "jurisdiction": "us:ca", 
        "title": "Item Four", 
        "type": "article-newspaper"
    }, 
    {
        "court": "District Court", 
        "id": "ITEM-5", 
        "title": "Item Five", 
        "type": "article-newspaper"
    }, 
    {
        "id": "ITEM-6", 
        "title": "Item Six", 
        "type": "article-newspaper"
    }
]
<<===== INPUT =====<<
